entry.title: Friday night: Showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Showers ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches developing after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 10:36 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. Periods of rain beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 10:36 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow or ice pellets. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to ice pellets or freezing rain in the evening then to periods of snow near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 10:36 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023
